meta.review_content:
Is there still real people working a Vodacom?
Tobi???
What a joke. Its like paying a game..... Every answer you give is like finishing a level on CandyCrush.

Funny how you can speak to a human if you call for insurance or something they try sell to you. And how easily they contact you if there is a problem with payment on your account.

But as soon as you require service... TOBI.... No option to speak to a real human so the option you want is never there.
Yippy you have a bot that can work on voice commands!!! Lol.
